website_summaries.verdict: Best smelling antioxidant cream. Helps with skin problems like eczema, rosacea and dermatitis.
pros: Five star ratings from those who have acne and other skin flare-ups
cons: Like many lotions, this doesn't contain any SPF

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Contains Phenoxyethanol. Beware! I had to have a facial x-ray today and just happened to find a review mentioning this harmful ingredient. I have had a very painful swollen nose for about a week now. My doc told me to get an x-ray since there did not seem to be any normal cause like a sinus infection. Realized this cream could likely be the culprit. Only wish I could return it, because it’s too late to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Transformed skin in days from eczema to beautiful
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this product I was mid eczema outbreak, with dry, itchy, painful red patches around my nose and face, and over all bad skin. By day two of using the cream my face was already better. By the next week my face looked completely better! I am blown away and in love with this product. I use it morning and night, and still wear makeup every day, and it doesn't stop this cream from doing its magic! Order it, you won't be disappointed. Pictures attached show from before product -day 2 -day 3 - day 10
customer_reviews.author: Mj R.

customer_reviews.title: The bottle does a great job of getting all the product out
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a while. Lasted me 4 months of using twice a day. Only need one dab. When I was done I wanted to see how much was left that wasn’t coming out when I pressed down so I can use my finger to get the rest but to my surprise there was nothing left. The bottle does a great job of getting all the product out!
customer_reviews.author: ChinoXS203

customer_reviews.title: Caused more visible lines/wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this product did not help my skin at all. I used it for 3 weeks and saw a very visible increase in fine lines! I do not usually spend this much on facial cream so this was very disappointing. I have returned to my $5.00 face cream from Walmart and my skin is heading back a little in the right direction!! I know this has great reviews, so it very well just may be my skin and something in the product that does the opposite of what it is supposed to do on my skin. I am returning, since company offers 30 day money back guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Alert!
customer_reviews.text: I did not really get to use this, and it's really my fault, but! Allergy warnings are listed for a reason. I tried it for 2 days and my skin was awful. Burning, inflamed, annoyed (ok, that was just me). So, i finally read the ingredients. LECITHIN!! ahh! That's egg, which isn't bad for your skin. Unless you have a terrible allergy. Then it sucks. So, i finally found the product that teaches me why we do a test area first. (Does anyone really do that?) I took it to work and left it on the break table. I don't know what journey it took after that, but may it be an interesting one.
customer_reviews.author: AmbiguouslyIncognito

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stuff. Here's to going all Natural!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, I love that it is all natural. Usually my face is very acne prone so I have to be very careful selecting new products to use. Great experience with this cream, acne didn't flare up at all. I have started using more natural products since I became pregnant and had to stop using a lot of my old acne creams & cleansers, due to doctor's orders. I'm very happy with this product and using more pure, natural products and think I will continue using from now on, even after the baby. People say my face looks great, happy to say goodbye to chemicals. Great Prize too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika A

customer_reviews.title: On my second bottle and I like the results.
customer_reviews.text: Ever get a fancy container of expensive face cream and it is next to impossible to get the last 3 uses due to packaging? Not so with LilyAna Natural Face Cream. I pulled the container totally apart to get the last little bit, but lo and behold, that jar had dispensed it all! I am thrifty, yes? Along those lines, this product keeps my face moisturized, but not greasy, even in the Arizona desert. Price is right, customer service most excellent and I can pronounce the ingredients. This face cream works as well as the expensive department store brands. I am a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great for thirsty skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the entire Lilyana line for the past few days. I've never really had a skincare regime before other than washing with a bar of soap. I have awful skin: blotchy, uneven skin tone, breakouts, oily spots, dry/flaky spots, etc. My face always feels like dry paper. I have never worn makeup due to these issues as I find makeup just sits on tops of my skin and looks horrible. I've already noticed fewer breakouts, more even skin tone, and my face is no longer flaking. I have actually worn makeup for the first time in years. I really like these products and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I purchased this cream. I really wanted to like it. Unfortunately, this cream caused me to breakout in hives and itch. I stopped using the cream for a week with the hopes that something else was causing the breakout. And when I started using it again the hives returned. I’m pretty bummed. I now use Vanicream- a recommendation from my allergist. No itchy and no hives, just very happy and moist skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Light rose scent is gone by the time I've covered my face
customer_reviews.text: I do not like an "old rose" scent, but after reading various reviews I decided to try this cream. I really like it's texture and weight, and a small amount sinks in to my 75 y/o skin immediately, leaving it feeling very soft. I don't expect any rejuvenating results at this point, just very happy that the light rose scent is gone by the time I've covered my face and neck. I'm extremely sensitive to scents, so to me, this is a good thing. Also love the little container! I wonder if younger people realize that it is fashioned after the old Colgate Shave Cream container? Or perhaps it is still in use.
customer_reviews.author: Linnie

customer_reviews.title: and LilyAna Naturals have a fantastic return policy
customer_reviews.text: this specific face cream was ok the first couple of days I used it, then my face started to burn, Amazon, and LilyAna Naturals have a fantastic return policy, I returned, and was very pleased with the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Girl

customer_reviews.title: i so love this product together with the retinol
customer_reviews.text: i so love this product together with the retinol , its not dry to my skin , it changed my skin texture , i dont need to use foundation
customer_reviews.author: fatima

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I was told about this product by one of my friends. I thought of giving it a try and haven’t regretted since. I fell in love with it. I’m almost done with my 3rd bottle and now I am not going back to any other product. I’m excited to try other products of this brand too. I am so thrilled to have found something that is right for me. My skin hasn’t looked this good in years. I am very happy with this face moisturizer and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Gunjan

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: I really like these products and wanted to try the face cream. The moisturizers I've been using are slightly more expensive and wanted something more affordable. It feels great the second I put it on but the second after my face feels super dry. I can tell a big difference in what I used before vs using this product. Maybe it's just not meant for me. There is no scent from what I can tell and it hasn't caused anything bad to happen other than the drying. I can't say it will be that way for everyone, that is simply my experience. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend it ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice a difference at all. Didn’t really moisturize very well yet left a oily feel. I didn’t see any improvement in my skin but started to break out more then I ever have. Definitely not happy and won’t be purchasing it ever again or recommending it to anyone sorry 😐
customer_reviews.author: Charles & Rosanna Kaelble

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The moisturizer is nothing special. It's very similar to the one I get from Trader Joe's. I should have looked carefully at the label. It is only by 1.7 ounces. The container is deceiving. It looks like it contains more but it is only a fraction of it. In the end, it is very expensive for what you get. It definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not for overly oily acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: This product probably isn't bad for those who don't have such oily excitable skin. After I did in depth dermatological research about my skin type and everything to look for & avoid I found out why this broke me out. PROs: has a nice mild fragrance that didn't smell overwhelming/ offensive. This cream has a pleasant texture. CONs: Made my facial skin break out a bit kicking my oil production into overdrive causing my face to be super oily after a few minutes. Keep in mind, my cleanser& toner I use a.m./p.m. are specifically formulated for oil control, deep hydration,don't counteract each other & are not too harsh. This was my only change in skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: Del B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Light & Perfect For Day Use
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer! In the morning, I rinse my face with water, put a vitamin C serum on, THIS moisturizer, and then sunscreen. With this product, I feel comfortable putting further sunscreen on because it is so light and disappears quickly and delivers moisturizer. No scent, which is a huge plus. For extra dry skin, I would recommend carrying this product around with you to "touch-up" on your moisturizing throughout the day. Further, the pump puts a lot of product out, so half a pump is usually plenty for my face. A full pump will have enough product for my face, neck, and chest.
customer_reviews.author: Song

customer_reviews.title: Awesome face cream
customer_reviews.text: I really like the face cream. It's not heavy or greasy at all and actually has a mattifying effect on my skin which is a huge plus for me because I have oily/shiny skin. Wears really well under my BB cream and powder. I have not broken out which is another plus since I tend to get acne with certain products. It's hard to find a basic moisturizer that I like AND that's natural so this is a winner in my eyes. I am very serious about using products without chemicals and will look into purchasing other products from them. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: D. Czerwinski

customer_reviews.title: Stop Looking and Just Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I have that special kind of skin that never fully aged out of acne, but now shows some fine lines and wrinkles. This cream, along with the vitamin C serum and the eye cream have been miracle workers. My skin has a more even complexion, it is firmer, and I recently went to the store without make-up (something I NEVER do). I have tried other creams and they never addressed all of my skin issues the way this cream does. Knowing that everyone has different skin needs, I can't say it will work for all people. BUT, for the price, it is definitely worth trying and hopefully you will become a regular customer like me!
customer_reviews.author: JJteach

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I was hesitant to purchase a facial cream without trying it first, however based on costumer reviews I placed my order. This cream is amazing, the texture is perfect, very light pleasant smell and not sticky. I struggle with red “Irish” skin, I have tried a variety of over the counter creams and serums some close to $300 and guess what none of them come close to this awesome product. I’m very pleased with this product and hope your results will be similar, buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J Szilagyi

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work well with my sensitive skin..
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice for the price and I use it every morning and evening. I was hoping with all the great reviews that i would have something amazing to say about it too. It helps my skin feel soft but I have been using it for a little over a month and my face is breaking out like crazy... it didnt start that way but I use it right after the shower and so my pores are all opened up. Theres no smell to it which is nice and absorbs really well. It is a good product for a lot of people but with my sensitive skin it did not turn out well.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anne

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about a month now, twice a day. It's nothing special. The smell was offputting at first, but I grew nose blind to it after continued use. As for improving my skin, there is no visible difference. As a moisturizer, it's ok. I will go back to using my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Littrell

customer_reviews.title: Loving this cream so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to start using on my face because I was experiencing dry flaky patches at the corner of my eye and the corner of my lip. The cream has definitely helped moisturize those areas but the biggest thing I'm impressed with is how much the redness has gone down in my face. I consider myself having very mild rosacea, and I really feel that this cream has done wonders as far as reducing my red cheeks. I absolutely love the way the face cream leaves my face feeling throughout the day. I have been using it since September 13th twice a day and I honestly couldn't be more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Brown

customer_reviews.title: My right side is always worse so it is taking more time but has lightened ...
customer_reviews.text: I only have used Cervae products because my skin is so irritable and I suffer from rosacea but now i am hooked on this face cream. It's been 5 days since using the face cream and my entire left cheek has cleared of redness. My right side is always worse so it is taking more time but has lightened up significantly. I love the feel of the cream, it is so light and gives my skin a glow. I also have received multiple compliments about how good my skin looks since starting using the cream last week! Please don't ever stop making this
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the cheapest & I've used the very, very expensive in skin care lines. This is a pleasant surprise. Despite the very affordable price, it's a smooth, light moisturizer (with a barely discernable scent) that leaves my skin fresh & dewey until morning - even with winter heating, who is usually brutal on my morning face. I tried it out of curiosity, but I'll definitely but it again because it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Mnurse

customer_reviews.title: This is not moisturizing... way over priced.
customer_reviews.text: After trying this product after looking at the reviews it almost makes me think Amazon is not being truthful.... big red flag. This item is okay.... but certainly not worth the price. It does not moisturize at all. I have to add a bit of almond oil to it to feel any moisture at all. It dries really fast and leaves a feeling of a light film. I will use what I have.. but it was certainly a lesson learned. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kreative

customer_reviews.title: Great price & effective, gentle cream
customer_reviews.text: This is the third LilyAna product I’ve purchased. I was looking for a effective, gentle cream to use day or night- this is perfect for my needs. I’m 60, with easily congested pores (acne prone), living in the arid southwest. This disappears into my skin quickly, keeps my skin evenly moisturized, doesn’t break me out, and has a mild, pleasing aroma. While I like the ease of dispensing from the container, it’s hard to know how much is left in it and when I should reorder, until I run out. Luckily, Amazon ships quickly, so I really can’t complain. Great cream!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that made it seem like this lotion was going to have some issues but I haven't had any issues with it. It smells good. The container is easy to pump. The lotion feels great on my skin. My face feels very soft. I've used it 3 times now since I just got it yesterday morning and I didn't wake up to any new acne. I got my order earlier than expected so that was great too. Even tho I just got it I feel like this is going to be my new favorite lotion that I will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E

customer_reviews.title: it has lasted a great deal longer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: At first I was unimpressed with this product. You receive a very small amount (I thought) for a very large price. However, it has lasted a great deal longer than I expected, and one pump from the bottle will cover your entire face and neck. It spreads very easily, smells amazing, and makes your skin feel super soft. I am torn on whether to continue to buy the product, but more than likely I will because it works for my skin type (sometimes oily, sometimes dry). And it definitely keeps my face from chapping up during winter (I live in Maine). That alone is a reason to like it!
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Caused breakouts and leaves oily residue
customer_reviews.text: I never have pimples on my face. Ever since using this product I’ve broken out several times with huge pimples!! :( I wish I could return it but it’s past the return time. It doesn’t feel like it gets absorbed into the skin to moisturize, but instead leaves a VERY OILY residue!! Yuck. And now that I’ve been reading the negative reviews about it containing a toxic chemical, I’m about to just toss it in the trash! I would like a refund because I bought all of their products (eye, face, retinol, vitamin c). So disappointed. I would like someone to reach out to me if you care.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Hello - I had been wanting to try this for a while and had the opportunity to review so bit the bullet - the cream was rich and emollient, absorbs into skin quickly. - soothing - does not burn or irritate. I have sensitive skin so this is important. - easily dispensed - pump mechanism dispenses the perfect amount - the packaging design is outstanding - this does not impact the effectiveness of the product but is worth mentioning - excellent customer service! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MIsaac80

customer_reviews.title: Best face cream I've used!
customer_reviews.text: If you want people to tell you that you look younger, which my friends have been telling me, use this face cream! It's light so it doesn't leave that greasy feeling and I only have to use a tiny bit so one bottle lasts a long time. I use it with the Lilyana Naturals Retinol cream and the serum every day and it's pretty much the only product I've used for two years with the exception of a moisturizing sunscreen - I hope they start making one with sunscreen in it! I love this product and the company! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Yu

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Every person's skin is different. This is obviously a well-made product with high-quality, natural ingredients. The smell is pretty pleasant, and I think the price is great. This being said, I need something that's a little heavier. My skin is combination oily-dry, and I will get dry patches outside of my t-zone if I'm not using a moisturize-y enough moisturizer...and that's during the summer. Wintertime? Forget about it. Even after applying 2 layers of this moisturizer right out of the shower, I still got dry patches. This being said, if I were still in my 20s, perhaps this lighter moisturizer would do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Petrus

customer_reviews.title: this product didnt work for my super dry skin
customer_reviews.text: this product didnt work for my super dry skin. i think this product would be best for average or oily skin types since it is rather thin. although this product didn't work for my face, i've been using their eye cream as on overall moisturizer. it has been working wonders! for all buyers considering this brand, i would try multiple items of the brand before swearing off on it. with a great refund policy and excellent customer service, what is there to lose? they really have great products and it's so important to support small businesses. keep up the great work guys =)
customer_reviews.author: Phuong T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend several times now, she loves it!!! I decided to try it one day when I noticed my face was dry and was amazed by the results. Instantly hydrated my skin without becoming oily and lasted all day. Face Cream is a superior product and I highly recommend it to anyone that is serious about skincare.
customer_reviews.author: bart

customer_reviews.title: Best for normal to dry skin
customer_reviews.text: It is a lighter cream that would work best on normal to dry skin. I have very dry skin, so this feels good going on but it is not quite emollient enough to keep my facial skin moist between washes. However the scent of roses is just lovely. It’s not strong at all but there is just enough scent there to make it quite refreshing as I apply it on my face and neck. I am enjoying this product so far but I still have to do applications of my heavy moisturizer at night.
customer_reviews.author: Reader99

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: A little background info: I have dry, sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts, scars easily, and can get flaky if not moisturized properly. I've been using this lotion for a couple weeks now and I'm pleased. It's nice and light, absorbs quickly, feels soothing on my skin, and smells wonderful. Very good experience so far! Update: I ran out of this lotion and started using a drug store brand. My skin became noticeably dry and uneven. So I've switched back, and now I guess I'm a customer for life! I no longer break out, my makeup goes on smooth, and my skin has a natural healthy glow. I definitely recommend buying if you're on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: It's a very very light moisturizer. My face still gets very dry even when using this twice a day. Also, it's very expensive for the amount of product you get. It ran out in about one month, even though I used it conservatively. I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed I should have listened to the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: Received this 2 weeks ago and returned this product. So disappointed I should have listened to the negative reviews. I applied a tiny dot on my wrist to test if I am allergic to it I noticed the cream is not rich and it was so thin. The smell is not right to be a face cream. It smells like glue the one that is used in schools.
customer_reviews.author: Granny M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skin care junkie and always looking for the best out there... this is definitely one of the best!! I've noticed a difference in my skin in just 2 weeks of using LilyAna Naturals (I also use the Retinol Cream as well as the Vitamin C serum) and I couldn't be happier! My pores appear smaller, skin tighter and smoother. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bobé

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you live in harsh cold or very dry climate
customer_reviews.text: I live in extremely cold winter climate. This cream is not doing what I need. It smells good, it feels good but my skin drinks it up, especially if I am outside for a few minutes. I’m 72 so this might be good for a younger person, in a less harsh climate. I have to apply at least 3-4 times a day. I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Ponama

customer_reviews.title: Worst cream
customer_reviews.text: Not a cream I'd recommend. To each his own surely but this cream was a lesson learned for me as it did not moisturize well or easily into my skin. Easy to use? Yes and that's all for me and I gave it a fair shot of a months use. No glow to skin or softness justdry & flat. Glad other reviewers had good results!
customer_reviews.author: Sone

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A little goes a long way. It works well for my sensitive skin and lasts throughout the day. It has wooed me into exploring other products in its line. It’s also great as a night cream.
customer_reviews.author: Tahj

customer_reviews.title: I will order again
customer_reviews.text: dispenser is easy on the hands...product is light, not overwhelmingly scented, leaves my skin feeling just the right amount of moisturized, lotion absorbs completely, not a bit greasy and leaves my skin feeling soft and the texture of my skin seems much better after almost 2 weeks of using this face cream. I'm 65 so not expecting miracles but am pleased with this product and I'll order it again.
customer_reviews.author: HLoden

customer_reviews.title: So many pluses, just not ideal for me
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cream but there is not SPF in it and it dries out around my eyes, which is the reason why I give it three stars. Now for the pluses: You can be a bit skint with it and it can be rubbed in quickly It is weightless! After 8 hours, I'm not greasy It is good for my sensitive skin It tightens and lifts your cheeks and neck area It came in good packaging: a clear plastic bag with the product name and lot number. Then sealed with typical shrink seal. The pump bottle is light and pretty! Love it, but only for days when I'll be inside a lot.
customer_reviews.author: kpettit

customer_reviews.title: Meh, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple of weeks now with no noticeable changes. The scent is fairly light and fades after applying. I have oily, acne prone skin....this did not make me break out, but I don't think it's helping either. Skin feels dry after a few hours. Maybe it works for some, but not me. Still on the hunt for the perfect moisturizer. Container did arrive with a small crack in the side, but not all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: after searching for a healthier moisturizer, I stumbled upon this... and have loved it. I have tried the retinal and vit-c as well, all equally great.
customer_reviews.author: D Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have Oil skin, so when try a different moisturize I'm fearful. But this lotion it's amazing, my skin is so hydration soft, and no shining:) Definitely I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Faby

customer_reviews.title: Organic FIRE paste
customer_reviews.text: This should have a GIANT WARNING LABEL printed on the front label, DANGER!! Filled with excitment I loaded a full palm of product and went all in and just coated my entire face, neck, and eyes. I almost met Jesus today guys! My face was on fire!!!! I couldn't wash it off fast enough! I will most definitely take the blame on this one as my husband laughs in the background. I will NEVER buy Face cream online again! Age defying my arse, more like age ending. Life as I once knew it is over after trying this product. Be safe to anyone brave enough. Take caution, trust me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Barely Moisturizing - not as great as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product but the moment I used it, I noticed that my skin felt more dry. I am having to use other lotions to get the moisture that the "normal" cream would offer. I know that every skin is different so I can be one of those outliers but for me, besides the smell, this is not a good cream. In my cart was their eye cream and serum and I am so thankful I wanted to purchase those after testing this product. (Also, I never write reviews so that means something to do and hopefully you as well.)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Caused a Very Bad Breakout
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write this review because I really love Lilyana Naturals Vitamin C Serum and Retinol Cream, but this product caused an AWFUL breakout all over my face and neck. I can definitely attribute the reaction to this face cream because it was the first time I used it, and it was the only product I changed in my regiment. I used it in the afternoon and it was fine—I even thought it worked pretty well for moisturizing and softening! But the next morning I woke up with massive skin eruptions. My guess is that it’s some sort of allergy and not necessarily from clogged pores. Either way, I won’t buy or use this cream again. :(
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: On my second bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this face cream, it didn't clog my pores and left my face/neck moisturized. Middle age isn't kind and I've notice my usually easy to care for skin started to break out with a heavier cream. This is perfect for day or night. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: McViv

customer_reviews.title: Nice tightening effect
customer_reviews.text: I like experimenting with different skincare products until I find something that works for my combination sensitive skin. I start my daily skincare ritual by applying face oil and then exercising my facial muscles with Glam face cupping from Lure Essentials. After 5 minutes of cupping, I remove any oil and residue then layer this moisturizing cream. My skin looks more radiant and feels firmer and looks more lifted.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Finds

customer_reviews.title: it’s just like any other ordinary lotion, not cream
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this cream but I can’t find anything special about it that justifies the price :( it is light, and provides moisture but again, it’s just like any other ordinary lotion, not a true cream. I do, however, like the retinol cream version a little more. But if I want lotion, I would use suave at a fraction of the price. Sorry, but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sensitive dry skin.  Like how quickly it dries on your face and feels wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this product and found they were very accurate. I’m fussy about what I use and had some trepidation it might not be all I needed it to be. But I was wrong...It’s not a greasy product, has a light scent, and dries nicely without feeling like you have too much on. I’m so happy with this I’m sure to be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for sensitive/irritated skin
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has frequent skin issues, I can so far say that I like this moisturizer very much. I have tried many "high end" cosmetic moisturizers from Chanel, Shiseido, Estee Lauder, etc... and because of my very sensitive skin/eczema they often burn like hellfire. This moisturizer is very soothing, smells nice, and leaves a smooth, clean feeling afterward. It is not heavy or oily, and is excellent for sensitive or combination skin. I also like that the ingredients are all natural, and there are no added fragrances-- which can often cause rashes or irritation (but the rose smell is heavenly!). I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aida Marin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the Rose & Pomegranate Face Moisturizer. I've gone through several bottles, which is a rarity for me. I am always looking for the next great thing, but this stuff is IT. I have sensitive skin, dry or combo, depending on the season, fine lines and texture. This lotion solved ALL of those issues. Non irritating, absorbs quickly, perfect under make-up, not greasy or oily at all. This has replaced my "high end", super expensive moisturizers - It's really THAT GOOD! What more can I say?! I'll continue to repurchase. Would love to try their other products.
customer_reviews.author: PrissyMissy75

customer_reviews.title: Moved from ultra coverage to sheer makeup in 6 weeks using these products!
customer_reviews.text: I preface this with I have hyperreactive skin and have struggled with acne for as long as I can remember. This product has not only reversed the trend of makeup to cover everything but made me feel confident that my skin looks good especially in my harsh New England winters! My skin LOVES this product! I pair it with the retinol from LilyAnna and have very few problems!
customer_reviews.author: meaghan morris

customer_reviews.title: Too Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My face gets super dry and red after the shower and burns a bit.. But this face cream is honestly a necessity in my life. Makes my face smooth even 24 hrs after applying. I will be a forever customer! Has a slight smell of lotion but it goes away once it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Not the most moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of facial moisturizers. I’m 24 with normal/combination skin and my face isn’t as oily as it was when I was a teenager. Now I love that extra oil on my face so I like moisturizer’s that provide that feeling and I usually add extra facial oil on after that too. At first this feels great and it smells really good (like rosebud) but after a couple minutes of drying that feeling goes away. Especially during the winter, that’s not really what I want. Perhaps I’ll try this again come summer but it’s just not doing it for me right now.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lenich

customer_reviews.title: LilyAna products are worh a try!
customer_reviews.text: LilyAna products are just the best for my combination skin. It feels great when applied, never stinging, and absorbs wonderfully. Make up goes on smoothly too. I have tried many different facial lotions before, famous brands cheap and expensive, and have finally found a product that works the best for me. Actually the retinol cream is the one I now use daily and I think works the best on my mature skin, but this one is good too. They are both geeat and are worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Woody

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It is very light (non-greasy; great for delicate skin) and you don't need a ton per application. It has a mild smell but I don't notice it after a couple of minutes. The company is also super personable. Huge recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: H. Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cream for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like how gentle this cream is. My face is pretty sensitive but I have had no issues with redness, breakouts or hives. It’s moisturizing without being heavy and feels lux without being too expensive. I wouldn’t say that it’s the absolute best cream that I’ve ever tried, but it’s solid for the price and a good pick for someone with normal or sensitive skin. Plus the package is very pretty on your vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bryan-Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and I actually used the whole bottle. I need to order more. Lasts a long time. I like the consistency and really moisturizes the face great! Also liked the bottle because the pump and doesn’t make a mess! I need to try the rest of the products! 💜
customer_reviews.author: Kendra white

customer_reviews.title: Left my skin amazing
customer_reviews.text: use this for about three months with the other products that they carry and it brightened my face it’s a shame because I stopped using it being a young male is very hard to keep up with beauty products and applying them but I can recall the difference it made in my skin my coworker couldn’t believe it
customer_reviews.author: Mahatmahilby

customer_reviews.title: No new acnes!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off, i have very oily, porous, acne prone skin. I bought this face moisturizer june 2017... i have been search for a good one for a while. I have been using the moisturizer for ~2 months and so far so good! I don't break out from using it even in this hot Texas weather. That's a win for me! I can't speak on the anti-aging properities as i have noticed no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Zinnie

customer_reviews.title: Works Beautifully! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love LilyAna Naturals Face Cream! I have auto-immune issues that come with a lot of allergies and many skin irritations. I have tried dozens of face creams with no luck. This cream works beautifully at soothing and moisturizing my face. It is never irritating or greasy. It feels light, creamy and smells amazing. It makes my skin feel soft and smooth. I am a customer for life and would be lost without it! I also use their "Retinol" formula at night - which is also not irritating. Face cream devotees know this not always the case with retinol.
customer_reviews.author: LisaRed

customer_reviews.title: Over drying and can't add sunscreen lotion
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to be helping my acne but it just didn't work. It is very drying and I tried layering with coconut oil underneath but that didn't work. My biggest problem was the piling up, it hard to describe but when I would try to put sunscreen on these little white pieces started coming up. I think it's some sort of filler the use and it just rolls off like your skins peeling. And there is no spf in this so no go if I can't add sunscreen on top.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I have dry-ish skin so I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by this face cream! I feel like I have dry-ish skin so I was looking for an inexpensive everyday moisturizer THAT WORKS. This definitely fit all of those criteria and then some. First, I LOVE the smell its so perfectly subtle and fresh, not perfume-y and overpowering. Second, the texture is awesome! Its not super thick and heavy where it takes forever to rub in, and its not so thin that its watery and feels like nothing. Its perfectly creamy (one pump covers my whole face and neck) and it leaves my skin feeling tight, clean and smooth. I would totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something that finally works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've used so many different moisturizers over the years and none of them have really done the trick until I found this. My skin tends to run on the dry and red side and after about a week I was able to tell a difference. Not only is my skin hydrated, the redness around my nose has really calmed down. My husband must like it too because I have to hunt for it in his stuff every morning. Great product, will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Pinup51

customer_reviews.title: I use it everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I am OBSESSED with facial moisturizers #17forever I bought this one to use as my daily cream I apply before I go out in the morning. I use it under my sunscreen and makeup, and it is nice and light. I prefer heavier creams for the night, but this one is really perfect for daytime. I wish the bottle was more eco-friendly and it is hard to tell how much you've used. But I like the cream itself. Good value for the money. I would order this again, but also I'm still curious to try more facial creams!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: There's a light scent that disappears, very moisturizing which has been great since I just delivered my baby boy I was having some dry skin bouts and helped get rid of my wrinkles I've been gaining since I had him and my dry skin as well. I recommend for anyone looking to help clear their acne up as well because it really is making my skin clear up and with more uses I'm excited to say I won't need foundation anymore! Being a codmotologist their recommended application of tapping it into skin is perfect as that message technique helps get blood flowing and absorbtion is quick into the pores. With one use I saw changes!
customer_reviews.author: Teagan K

customer_reviews.title: Love These Prodcuts
customer_reviews.text: I've been using This Eye Cream along with the Vitamin C Serum and Retinol Cream for about a month and am very impressed with these products. My face feels moist and supple and under eye creases seem to be less pronounced. I've used a wide range of products, some very expensive, and these are better then any I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Ooh La La
customer_reviews.text: This silky, smooth cream is absolutely FAB! With the summer temps in Texas reaching into triple digits, I have to have something lightly moisturizing that doesn't make my face look like the fried foods the south is famous for. This cream does the trick. It absorbs faster than the morning dew, and leaves my face feeling as soft as a baby's little behind. I'm not sure which ingredient it is, but something in this heavenly concoction helps control my oh-so-annoying adult acne. I mix a dab of my favorite sunscreen with this cream to help stave off those pesky wrinkles, and VIOLA, beautiful inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Rose

customer_reviews.title: Try this face cream! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: LilyAna Naturals Face Cream is every bit as wonderful as all of their other products. I have extremely sensitive skin that tends to react badly to new products, even when they are introduced slowly. I never experienced this with any LilyAna product, including the Eye Cream, Face Cream, Retinol Cream (I began with every other night application for the first two weeks) and finally the Vitamin C serum. This cream goes on nicely and absorbs without leaving a tacky feeling. My skin is oily and since I've been using this face cream it seems to have improved and I don't have that dreaded shine just a few hours after applying makeup. I highly recommend all LilyAna Naturals products!
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyMom

customer_reviews.title: Love at First Application
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I don't leave a lot of reviews, but I simply had to tell everyone how satisfied I am with this purchase. The Face Cream moisturizer has a light scent and amazing results. I was using another cream, paying twice as much as this cream - with little result. I turn 50 this year and my skin has been feeling dry and leathery, not to mention red spots. After using the cream only a few days, my skin looks and feels moist and dewy and the red spots are gone. I 100% recommend this for anyone experiencing dry or spotty skin. Thank you, LilyAna Naturals!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite for healthy looking skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to have found this face cream. I don't even know how many products I have tried in the past that made me break out or irritated my skin. But this little pot of gold keeps me moisturized without feeling oily or breaking me out! I have insanely sensitive skin, and recently I've been battling hormonal acne at the age of 29. My skin ranges from oily to combination, and dry during the winter months. So after some review reading and research I decided to give this cream a try and needless to say I am loving it! I use it morning and night and my skin is looking so healthy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CREAM! RICH AND CREAMY WITH BEING HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: I have dry combination skin. I have bought LilyAna naturals creams for a long time and love the feel and the fact that they don’t make my skin dry or break out. I highly recommend all of their products!
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: "Love this face cream moisturizer. Not only did I ...
customer_reviews.text: "Love this face cream moisturizer. Not only did I order the one for the face, but I went online to buy the eye cream retinol cream. I use the eye cream with the face cream. The I might alternate and use the retinol cream with the eye cream. Skin definitely feel softer and the bags under my eyes are not so prominent. I don't expect any cream to do miracles for those, but I have notice a difference. I will definitely be ordering again, as your products are healthy for the skin
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Major

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this moisturizer for a little over a week now and I love it. I have severe combination skin that can be super oily and peeling at the same time and this really seems to help balance it out. I've been using it in combination with the Vivo Per Lei Facial Peeling Gel and I'm pretty happy with the results. No more flaky eyebrow area! I should also mention that most moisturizers cause my skin to burn because it is sensitive as well, but NOT this one! I use this in the morning and at night. The only negative thing I see is the size. I feel like I'm going to run out of this pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Understood

customer_reviews.title: Retinol cream top notch this was a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the retinol Cream a few times and I love it! This moisturizer is a disappointment!’I find myself either not using at all or adding my other moisturizers!’I wish I hadn’t ordered and just stuck with the retinol cream!
customer_reviews.author: jean Micou

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective!
customer_reviews.text: First off I’m a man. Apparently face moisturizing is something I missed out on in the last ~20 something years (according to the women I meet). This stuff seems to get the job done and keeps your skin looking fresh. I hate feeling oily but this lotion is water soluable so I don’t get that greasy feeling from it. Only reason for 4/5 is that there isn’t any SPF in this. If they had an SPF version I’d definitely give 5. Cheap and effective, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good ingredients, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this moisturizer. After doing much research on both products and ingredients, I settled on this one. I was looking forward to Using it, but once I applied it to my face, I immediately noticed that it caused a slight skin itch that did not fully go away. I ordered a different product and did not have the same experience. This might work for some people, as everyone is different. It did not quite work for me. I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Edon Ben-Artzi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely Face Cream!
customer_reviews.text: Be still my moisturized heart! This face cream is fabulous! It's not greasy and absorbs into the skin nicely. It says "Rose & Pomegranate", however there's no scent to it. I like that aspect. Something about slathering perfume-y lotions on my face doesn't feel right. I apply this lotion morning and night and my skin feels fantastic. It's not heavy yet does a great job keeping Winter dryness at bay. LOVE this stuff.... and the vintage label is giving me the feels! :)
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Good Base Coat for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I am over 70 and my face is definitely much drier than in my youth, especially in the winter when the inside air is so dry. I use this pleasant moisturizer because its ingredients appear to be relatively benign and don't irritate my eyes. The cream sinks in well and provides a non-toxic base coat. I have found it to be, however, too thin to take away that taut feeling, although in summer it may be enough on its own. So in winter I wait a few minutes and then apply a thicker cream on top. Together they provide the result I need, my eyes are not irritated and my skin feels smooth and supple all day.
customer_reviews.author: Book Case

customer_reviews.title: Read good reviews wish it worked out for me
customer_reviews.text: So I read many good things about the item. Its vegan, natural , etc, which all sounded great. I have really sensitive skin so when I applied this cream for a couple days it actually had my skin dried out. This product may be great for other people but my with my combination skin it didn't hydrate as much as I wanted. So I'm not gonna knock the item if its working for others. Just gotta find something that agrees with my skin. Hope this helps people. So far I ended up going back to a cream that really hydrated my skin to the max which was etude collagen cream. If anyone has similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Extreme help for a red and acne dotted pregnant face!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for about a week however it has made a HUGE difference. I'm pregnant w/ my second child, pregnancy is NOT good for my skin - no glow here. My pregnant skin turns is similar to a hormonal teenager (except I'm 40). Extreme redness and acne on my cheeks, forehead, and chin are quickly disappearing and my skin seems to be returning to normal. I like the dispenser that the lotion comes in - it makes it easy to use a good amount w/o waste. I'd pay more for a glass jar versus plastic - just an FYI to the manufacturer. Looking forward to seeing how this products works post-pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: recre8andplay2day

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Like no other that I have tried!👍
customer_reviews.text: Omg...this cream is like no other that I have tried. I have dry skin and this cream makes my face silky smoooooth! Very happy 60 year old woman! All natural ingredients, does have a little smell to it, but the results are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Woman Blessed

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this solely based on the reviews Andy entire face broke out like it's never done before! I've never had such a reaction to a skin product in my life. My entire jaw line is full of little bumps and it's all because of this face cream. Read the ingredients before you purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my skin looking youthful
customer_reviews.text: I am 67 yrs old and use both the Face cream and Eye cream. My skin looks 40ish and I receive compliments frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Overly

customer_reviews.title: Caused really bad breakouts on non-sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, but it caused my skin to break out (badly) every time I tried to use it. I liked the ingredients used, the smell was wonderful without being very strong and the lotion itself was a little heavier of a consistency than I was hoping for but not a deal breaker for me as it didn't feel very oily. I gave it a few tries before ultimately putting it away for good after each of the test spots resulted in painful breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Keep it by my bedside so I don’t forget to use it at night!
customer_reviews.text: Great and affordable for my 45yo sensitive skin. I use the face cream twice a day with the vitamin C serum and the retinol once or twice a week since it is my first time trying it. Makes my skin so soft and doesn’t feel greasy and no strong perfume smell. Love it and will be trying the eye cream next!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bechtel

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive combination skin, this worked most of the time. Some days it felt like there was way too much lotion on...like it became greasy. I did use the whole bottle and thought it was a good product. the scent also did not agree with my body. It doesn't have a heavy scent out of the bottle but I definitely did not like how it wore on me. I would buy this again if the scent were different.
customer_reviews.author: 2crowes

customer_reviews.title: Not for the product for me
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to love this product. The packaging is so cute, it smells amazing, its natural and I like the texture. My issue with it is every time I use it, I break out. I am older, and I don't have breakouts anymore. I noticed it shortly after I purchased it so I stopped using it, then tried it again a couple weeks later. Same results, I broke out again. I have stopped using this product completely now and I am super bummed. From the other reviews, I can tell some people haven't had this reaction, but from my own personal experience, I would not use this face cream again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I tried the face cream moisturizer for several weeks. I had several people to comment that my skin looked so good! I was happily shocked. Now that I am getting older, I see the problems with my skin (baggy eyes, crow lines, etc) in the mirror. However, those thinks almost disappeared while I used this moisturizing cream. I highly recommend this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Buy ANY product from lilyanas.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best, non-greasy, moisturizers out there and budget friendly. I was using olays anti aging moisturizers for years. This is just as good, if not better and slightly cheaper. I have extremely dry skin and this makes it feel baby soft and I can apply my makeup on directly after. I have recently gotten another product from lilyanas and it was amazing as well. Buy all their products. What an amazing product and company
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail status
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Love. L O V E. I have super, super sensitive oily fair skin, and moisturizing has been the bane of my existence since I was a teen. Everything makes me break out, makes me more oily. Then, I found this. It’s incredible. I use it morning and night, and my skin just drinks it in. It’s so gentle you really can use it on the under-eye area as well! My skin is plumped and radiant and holds its balance without going into oily hyperdrive or breaking out. Please never stop making this!
customer_reviews.author: Jordana

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Cream
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I seriously cannot say enough positive things about this product, their other products, and the company itself. Customer service sends you an email with detailed instructions and seems very attentive should you need anything. The product itself just feels good on the face and is very moisturizing without being greasy or heavy. I love this stuff! I usually make my own face cream, but will be buying this from here on out. The price point is great, and the product is fabulous. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Smac

customer_reviews.title: This product is alright but won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: This had a four star review so I tried it but was disappointed. I have tried several moisturizers since I decided to stop paying $50 for them and this one is my least favorite. I will finish it but have ordered another brand for night cream. This one just doesn't provide moisture or a refreshing look to my middle aged skin. It may be fine for people 40 or younger. So it you are not in your fifties, this cream may do the job, but I wouldn't try it if you are older than 50.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

product_meta.title: Face Cream Moisturizer for Women - Anti-Aging Wrinkle Cream for Face, Face Moisturizer For Dry Skin, Dark Spot Brightening, Rose and Pomegranate Extracts - 1.7oz
product_meta.description: For truly radiant, youthful looking skin, start with our luxurious Face Cream Moisturizer. Formulated with a blend of natural, vegan botanicals and actives including Rose Distillate, Aloe Vera, Vitamin C and E, and Cranberry Extract, this luxuriously rich yet lightweight cream melts into the skin quickly for all-day hydration. Safe for all skin types, Face Cream’s targeted anti-aging benefits help fight the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles; boost firmness and elasticity; brighten hyper-pigmentation, dark spots, and uneven skin tone; and ward off dryness and dehydration. Apply morning and night to cleansed skin.
feature_bullets: ☑️ NOURISHING AND HYDRATING. Let the moisture in! Smooth, featherweight cream hydrates and melts into the skin to help soften and minimize the look of aging including fine lines, deeper wrinkles and rough texture, as well as address dehydration, flaking, peeling, and tightness.

☑️ SKIN-FIRST INGREDIENTS. Premium cocktail of all-natural, skin-loving botanicals and actives help leave your complexion looking youthful and radiant including rose distillate, aloe vera juice, alpha lipoic acid, DMAE, provitamin A, Vitamin C Ester, Vitamin E; and cranberry, lemon, and orange extract.

☑️ ULTIMATE REJUVENATION. Now, you can help banish dullness, dark spots, and hyperpigmentation while keeping skin soft, smooth, and radiant in one easy step. Face Cream Moisturizer includes targeted ingredients known for their rejuvenating effect on damaged and aged skin, from sun spots to acne scars to redness to dull skin tone.

☑️ ALL IN ONE. Formulated with everything your skin wants (and nothing it doesn’t), our elegant Face Cream works on all skin types including normal, dry, oily, and mature, and may be safely used on skin conditions such as rosacea, eczema, and dermatitis. Plus, Face Cream absorbs instantly and won’t clog pores.

☑️ CLEAN. NATURAL. AND FREE OF. All-natural, vegan ingredients. Made in the USA with no artificial fragrances or colors, and free of gluten, parabens, phthalates, SLS, SLES, and petroleum. And we never have nor ever will test on animals.
